blurb:
# Hello, I'm Giri üëã

I'm a software engineer passionate about building elegant solutions to complex problems. With over a decade of experience spanning startups to enterprise, I specialize in crafting performant, user-centric applications.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new places, capturing moments through photography, or diving deep into the latest tech trends. I believe in continuous learning and sharing knowledge with the community.

> "The best way to predict the future is to create it." - Peter Drucker

highlights: Building an analytics platform to measure AI adoption and ROI across organizations
Defining product vision for enterprise AI measurement

careerTimeline.description: Led development of organizational network analysis features in Microsoft Viva Insights.
highlights: Built features for understanding collaboration patterns across organizations
Delivered change management analytics for enterprise customers

careerTimeline.description: Led development of Viva Insights focused on manager and team effectiveness.
highlights: Built manager effectiveness insights and recommendations
Shipped team productivity features for Viva platform

careerTimeline.description: Led development of the Viva Insights Briefing Email.
highlights: Delivered a daily personalized productivity digest to hundreds of millions of M365 users
Built features focused on individual productivity and wellbeing

careerTimeline.description: Led the development of ChatOps integrations in Azure DevOps.
highlights: Built modern, fluid UX integrations for developer productivity in chat clients like Teams and Slack

careerTimeline.description: Built core Azure DevOps features across work item tracking, version control, and documentation.
highlights: Shipped Kanban boards for agile work item planning
Built Git user experiences for source control
Created modern Wiki for team documentation

careerTimeline.description: Built CodeLens in Visual Studio IDE.
highlights: Built CodeLens client in Visual Studio IDE
Built highly scalable cloud service powering CodeLens, serving millions of developers

careerTimeline.description: Interned in the Microsoft Windows Servicing division.
highlights: Built support for in-the-flow testing of Windows image repair/refresh
